segments.text: I see the boy standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, but I'm really worried he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching him balance like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together to get those cookies without being noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before or if it's their first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks like he's really concentrating, but I'm scared he might lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit tense, but also kind of sweet to see them cooperating like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit anxious watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
